meanings: one's 60th birthday (or 61st in the traditional age reckoning system) when one has lived through a full sexagenary cycle

lessons.japanese: 母方の祖父は明日還暦を迎える。
lessons.english: My grandfather on my mother's side is celebrating his 60th birthday tomorrow.

lessons.japanese: 明日は母方の祖父の還暦祝いをする。
lessons.english: My grandfather on my mother's side is celebrating his 60th birthday tomorrow.

lessons.japanese: 明日は母方の祖父の還暦のお祝いをする。
lessons.english: My grandfather on my mother's side is celebrating his 60th birthday tomorrow.

lessons.english: My grandfather on my mother's side is celebrating his 60th birthday tomorrow.
